message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'd like to save some money. Can you meet me at $12,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is a fair offer, the value of this product to me is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $17,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $15,000. Can you consider this price?
